mapper.select: select review_no as reviewNo, item_no as itemNo, member_id as memberId, member_nickname as memberNickname, review_rate as reviewRate, review_content as reviewContent, review_date as reviewDate from tour_review join member using(member_id) where item_no=#{_parameter}
select region_country as regionCountry from region group by region_country order by 1
select region_no as regionNo, region_city as regionCity from region where region_country=#{_parameter} order by 2 asc
select item_no as itemNo from tour where member_id=#{_parameter} order by 1 desc

select item_no as itemNo, member_id as memberId, member_name as memberName, phone, email, item_title as itemTitle, region_country as regionCountry, region_city as regionCity, max_person as maxPerson, begin_date as beginDate, end_date as endDate, item_content as itemContent, item_price as itemPrice, tour_times as tourTimes, p.filename, close_check as closeCheck from tour join member using(member_id) join photo p on(board_no=item_no and board_class=4) join region using(region_no) where item_no=#{_parameter}
select count(*) as cnt from tour_review where item_no = #{_parameter}
mapper.update: update tour set close_check=1 where item_no in(select item_no as itemNo from tour where end_date < (sysdate+1) and close_check=0)
mapper.select: select item_no as itemNo, item_title as itemTitle from tour where member_id=#{_parameter}
select tour_times as tourTimes from tour where item_no=#{itemNo}
mapper.update: update tour set close_check=-1 where item_no=#{_parameter}
update tour set close_check=1 where item_no=#{_parameter}
